languages.text: Некоторые корабли защищены {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитами{/g} — чтобы нанести {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g} такому противнику, необходимо прежде пробить щиты. Два щита прикрывают бока корабля, один закрывает нос и еще один — корму.

Some ships are protected by {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. To deal {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to such an enemy, you must first pierce their shields. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.
languages.original_text: Некоторые корабли защищены {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитами{/g} — чтобы нанести {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g} такому противнику, необходимо прежде пробить щиты. Два щита прикрывают бока корабля, один закрывает нос и еще один — корму.

traits.locale_text: Some ships are protected by shields. To deal damage to such an enemy, you must first pierce their shields. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.
Some ships are protected by shields. To deal damage to such an enemy, you must first pierce their shields. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.
Some ships are protected by shields. To deal damage to such an enemy, you must first pierce their shields. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.

Some ships are protected by {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. To deal {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to such an enemy, you must first pierce their shields. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.

Some ships are protected by {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. To deal {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to such an enemy, you must first pierce their shields. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.

languages.text: Algunas naves están protegidas por {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g}. Para infligirles {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g}, primero necesitas atravesar sus escudos. Hay dos sistemas de escudos que cubren los costados de la nave, otro que protege la proa y otro la popa.
languages.original_text: Some ships are protected by {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. To deal {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to such an enemy, you must first pierce their shields. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.

traits.locale_text: Algunas naves están protegidas por escudos. Para infligirles daño, primero necesitas atravesar sus escudos. Hay dos sistemas de escudos que {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cubren{/g} los costados de la nave, otro que protege la proa y otro la popa.

languages.text: 一部の船は{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}シールド{/g}で守られている。このような敵に{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるには、まずシールドを貫通させなければならない。ふたつのシールドアレイが船の側面を覆っており、ひとつは船首を、もうひとつは船尾を守る。
languages.original_text: Some ships are protected by {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. To deal {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to such an enemy, you must first pierce their shields. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.

traits.locale_text: 一部の船はシールドで守られている。このような敵にダメージを与えるには、まずシールドを貫通させなければならない。ふたつのシールドアレイが船の側面を{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}覆い{/g}、ひとつは船首を、もうひとつは船尾を守る。

languages.text: 部分战舰受到{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}保护。若要对敌方舰体造成{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，首先需要击穿敌方护盾。整艘舰船由两个护盾阵列进行保护，一个保护舰首，一个保护船尾。
languages.original_text: Some ships are protected by {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. To deal {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to such an enemy, you must first pierce their shields. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.

traits.locale_text: 部分战舰受到护盾保护。若要对敌方舰体造成伤害，首先需要击穿敌方护盾。整艘舰船由两个护盾阵列进行保护，一个保护船首，一个保护船尾。{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}{/g}

languages.text: Manche Schiffe sind durch {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schilde{/g} geschützt. Um einem solchen Gegner {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zuzufügen, musst du zuerst seine Schilde durchdringen. Zwei Schildfelder schützen die Seiten des Schiffes, eines schützt den Bug und eines das Heck.
languages.original_text: Some ships are protected by {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. To deal {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to such an enemy, you must first pierce their shields. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.

traits.locale_text: Manche Schiffe sind durch Schilde geschützt. Um einem solchen Gegner Schaden zuzufügen, musst du zuerst seine Schilde durchdringen. Zwei Schildfelder {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}schützen{/g} die Seiten des Schiffes, eines schützt den Bug und eines das Heck.

languages.text: Des {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} protègent certains vaisseaux. Pour infliger des {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à un tel ennemi, vous devez d'abord venir à bout de ses boucliers. Deux rangées de boucliers couvrent les flancs du vaisseau, l'une protège sa proue et l'autre sa poupe.
languages.original_text: Some ships are protected by {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. To deal {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to such an enemy, you must first pierce their shields. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.

traits.locale_text: Des boucliers protègent certains vaisseaux. Pour infliger des dégâts à un tel ennemi, vous devez d'abord percer ses boucliers. Deux rangées de boucliers {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couvrent{/g} les flancs du vaisseau, l'une protège sa proue et l'autre sa poupe.
